title: Remedy Cafe - South Side
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A licensed chai bar Indian restaurant offering vegan choices in food and baked goods. Vegan icluding chana masala, sabji masala, daal, vegan chicken chana wrap-- all with either pita or rice. Hummus is served with pita. Some of the aforementioned dished can be ordered in wrap form (note: the wraps include a herbed mayo, so make sure to specify if you want it to be vegan, and the kitchen will replace mayo with hummus). House-made chai is vegan based with almond milk and soy milk options. Sells packaged hummus and chai for take home.
